dietary.yes_sub_label: What details do the caterers need to know.
dietary.veg: The main meal will be a sharing feast of local beef, roasted heritage potatoes and a range of exciting vegetable side dishes.

step_3.title: Thanks
step_3.subtitle: We look forward to celebrating with you!
step_3.accommodation_bumph_one: If you're hoping to stay then there are options both onsite and in the local area. Accommodation is limited though so we'd encourage you to get it booked ASAP (it would also help us with planning the facilities onsite)!
step_3.accommodation_bumph_two: More information about accommodation can be found here
step_3.accommodation_bumph_three: We have the venue for the weekend so will have some more casual get togethers for those who are staying the Friday evening or Sunday morning.
step_3.accommodation_bumph_four: More general information about the day, venue and transport can be found here
step_3.accommodation_bumph_: but any questions or queries, give us a call or email. lydia_king@hotmail.co.uk
step_3.accommodation_bumph_link_text: More information about accommodation can be found here
